sentences.en: METHODS 4 species of Sanguisorbae and a adulterant were analysed by molecule biological technique random amplified polymorphic DNA(RAPD)and HPLC fingerprinting technique respectively.
sentences.cn: 方法采用分子生物学技术随机扩增多态性DNA（RAPD）技术和HPLC技术对地榆属的4个品种及其混淆品进行分析。

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To compare and identify Zaocys dhumnades and its adulterant Elaphe dione.
sentences.cn: 目的比较鉴别乌梢蛇与白条锦蛇.

sentences.en: Therefore, amylase isozyme electrophoresis can be used to detect the quality of honey and adulterant.
sentences.cn: 所以, 可以通过淀粉酶同工酶电泳的方法来检测蜂蜜产品质量、以及蜂蜜掺假.

words.tran_cn: 在…中掺入杂质（adulterate的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: a substance that is secretly added to food or drink, making it less pure
